text:
e="preserve">The AAA 400 Drive for Autism is a Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series race held annually at Dover International Speedway, it is one of two races on the circuit, with the other one being the Dover 400 in October, The race is the 11th race of the season and AAA became the title sponsor for 2016.
NASCAR had memorable finishes at this racetrack.
The race reduced from 500 miles to 400 miles in 1998.
